thread.title: Mavericks surf contest likely canceled after organizers file for bankruptcy
thread.title_full: Mavericks surf contest likely canceled after organizers file for bankruptcy

author: Katie Dowd
title: Mavericks surf contest likely canceled after organizers file for bankruptcy
text:
Mavericks surf contest likely canceled after organizers file for bankruptcy Katie Dowd | on February 1, 2017 Photo: Mathew Sumner, Special To The Chronicle Image 1 of / 23 Close Image 1 of 23 Alex Martins takes off on a wave in semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Alex Martins takes off on a wave in semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Photo: Mathew Sumner, Special To The Chronicle Image 2 of 23 Ken Collins, left, and Chris Bertish surf a giant wave during the second heat of the Mavericks surfing contest Friday, Feb. 12, 2016, in Half Moon Bay, Calif. (AP Photo/Ben Margot) Ken Collins, left, and Chris Bertish surf a giant wave during the second heat of the Mavericks surfing contest Friday, Feb. 12, 2016, in Half Moon Bay, Calif. (AP Photo/Ben Margot) Photo: Ben Margot,   3 of 23 Greg Long rides a wave in the finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Greg Long rides a wave in the finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Photo: Mathew Sumner, Special To   23 
Nic Lamb surfs a giant wave during the finals of the Mavericks surfing contest Friday, Feb. 12, 2016, in Half Moon Bay, Calif. Lamb won the event. (AP Photo/Ben Margot) 
Nic Lamb surfs a giant wave during the finals of the Mavericks surfing contest Friday, Feb. 12, 2016, in Half Moon Bay, Calif. Lamb won the event. (AP Photo/Ben Margot) Photo: Ben Margot,   5 of 23 Jamie Mitchell wipes out on a giant wave during the finals of the Mavericks surfing contest Friday, Feb. 12, 2016, in Half Moon Bay, Calif. (AP Photo/Ben Margot) Jamie Mitchell wipes out on a giant wave during the finals of the Mavericks surfing contest Friday, Feb. 12, 2016, in Half Moon Bay, Calif. (AP Photo/Ben Margot) Photo: Ben Margot,   6 of 23 Nic Lamb rides a wave in the semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Nic Lamb rides a wave in the semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Photo: Mathew Sumner, Special To The Chronicle Image 7 of 23 Buy photo Steve Goodrick (center) of Sacramento and others view the Titans of Mavericks on a large screen in front of the Mavericks Surf Shop where Red Bull was showing a live stream of the contest on Friday, February 12, 2016 in Half Moon Bay, Calif. less Steve Goodrick (center) of Sacramento and others view the Titans of Mavericks on a large screen in front of the Mavericks Surf Shop where Red Bull was showing a live stream of the contest on Friday, February ... more Photo: Lea Suzuki, The Chronicle Buy this photo Image 8 of 23 A boat operator wears a skeleton mask at the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. A boat operator wears a skeleton mask at the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Photo: Mathew Sumner, Special To   23 Nic Lamb gets rescued in the semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Nic Lamb gets rescued in the semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Photo: Mathew Sumner, Special To   23 Travis Payne, green, rides a wave as Nic Lamb takes a breath before getting hit by white water in the semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Travis Payne, green, rides a wave as Nic Lamb takes a breath before getting hit by white water in the semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Photo: Mathew Sumner, Special To   23 Travis Payne, green, and Nic Lamb, orange, ride a wave in the semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016. Travis Payne, green, and Nic Lamb, orange, ride a wave in the semi-finals of the Titans of Mavericks surf contest in Half Moon Bay, CA on Friday, February 12, 2016.
